I’m going to kiss you on the mouth. $7#/118 80 82 338 184 186 436 438/Oh this is sick! $h/-2 -12 -15 -28/Hm. Do better. $s/18 -24 -22/Wow, I hate it! I’m going to like you less from now on. $h#/215 260 482 281/Oh? A gift? Thanks I suppose. Next time grab me some glass./330/

Entries.give_flowersA: Woah…really @? That’s amazing! I have flowers for you too!$h#$b#We’re dating now. $l
Entries.give_flowersB: I absolutely accept! You’re the best, @.$l
Entries.give_pendant: !!!$7#$b#You... you want to get married? Is this you proposing to me, @!?$l#$b#Oh my gosh I gotta tell Clint I’m moving out this is so exciting!!$h
Entries.rejectNPCB: Yeah no way dude. $k#$e#Could you leave me alone now?
Entries.reject_two_heartA: Yeah uh…this is awkward. I don’t feel the same.$6
Entries.reject_two_heartB: I don’t really know you all that well @, get those flowers out of my face and go home.$k#$b#Or go to the saloon. Drink your sorrows away or something.$9
Entries.reject_four_heartA: I think you’re pretty cool but, I’m not so sure yet @. Sorry.
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Oh um, no thank you. I can’t even commit to one favorite ore right now.$k#$b#Bummer.
Entries.engageB: Oh so you’re a cheater, you filthy- censored$a#$e#%Her censored rage continues
Entries.marriedA: @? What in the world are you doing? Just stop. $a
Entries.marriedB: You want to marry me? You're already married, @.$a#$e#@. Are you drunk or something? Go away before I tell your spouse.$a
Entries.refusal_knownA: Maybe slow your roll a little bit. Chill out.
Entries.refusal_knownB: It's a little too early for this, don't you think?$0#$e#I appreciate the thought, @.
Entries.refusal_botherA: Uhh... It's still a no, @. Sorry.$0
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: So. Here's what's going to happen: I am going to walk away and pretend you never did that.

Entries.Jackal: I'm gonna look so hot in a wedding dress. $h
Entries.Jackal1: Oh, yeah, I'm super excited to get married too. $l

Entries.Jackal: I'm gonna dance so hard. You won't even know what hit you.$k#$b#It'll be my shoes. They're gonna hit you.$h
Can you keep up with my dancing? Bet ya can't, loser. I love you!$h
I threw in some milk...what?#$e#Are you surprised I didn't put in something inedible?#$e#I'm dumb not stupid @.
I put in some Iridium milk, like usual. It's one of my favorites you know!
These jellies look like little sapphires, they're so beautiful. $h
Hey hun! I wanna know what the sand is like in the moon jellies natural habitat, I bet it's pearlescent!$h
You should see my grange display! It's full of all my finest weapons.$7
Hey hun! You should try and get me unbanned from the activities here.#$e#That clown deserved what he got.
So...Who brought the literal monster and expects me not to fight it?$u
Be careful in there, honey!
Hm, interesting. I'll have to ask what's his face at the Guild how he captured it.
This festival is lame, Willy's job is literally fishing, how is anyone supposed to beat him. $9
Good luck in the fishing contest, sweetheart. You're going to do great!$4#$e#I'll be cheering for you!$1
